title: Mindflow Workshop: Mindfulness-Immersion Integration for Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational learning concepts and reflective self-assessment experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility and applicability in everyday work environments

learning_goals: Practice mindfulness meditation for at least 10 minutes daily to enhance the ability to focus on the present moment
Experience the state of flow (immersion) at least three times during weekly project execution and conduct self-assessment
Develop at least two case studies applying integrated mindfulness-flow strategies in organizational collaboration projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
